About Me

I am a graduate research assistant in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Texas at Dallas. Currently , I am working with Dr.Wei Yang and Dr.Shiyi Wei. My research interests are in machine learning (ML), natural language processing (NLP) and software security/testing.
